name: Azeri Yogurt-Marinated Chicken Thighs
author: ToffeeSmiles22
summary: Tender chicken thighs marinated in rich and creamy yogurt mixed with spices is a popular dish in Azerbaijan.
directions: Combine yogurt, garlic, onion, turmeric, cinnamon, paprika, tarragon, mint, red pepper flakes, and orange juice in a bowl
Dip each chicken thigh into yogurt mixture and place on a plate
Cover with foil and marinate in the refrigerator for at least 4 hours
Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Grease a baking dish and place chicken thighs inside
Bake in the preheated oven until chicken is no longer pink at the bone and the juices run clear, 50 to 55 minutes
An instant-read thermometer inserted near the bone should read 165 degrees F (74 degrees C)
